module.name: docbook-xsl-1.76
docbook-xml-4.4
docbook-xml-4.1.2
docbook-xml-4.2
docbook-xml-4.3
docbook-sgml-4.4
docbook-sgml-4.5
docbook-sgml-4.2
docbook-sgml-4.3
docbook-sgml-4.0
docbook-sgml-4.1
docbook-dsssl-1.79
module.uninstall:
_dsssl_datadir="${_datadir}/docbook/dsssl-1.79" _dsssl_docdir="${_docdir}/docbook/dsssl-1.79"
rm -rf ${_dsssl_datadir} ${_dsssl_docdir}
rmdir ${_datadir}/docbook/dsssl-1.79 2>/dev/null rmdir ${_datadir}/docbook 2>/dev/null rmdir ${_datadir} 2>/dev/null
rmdir ${_docdir}/docbook/dsssl-1.79 2>/dev/null rmdir ${_docdir}/docbook 2>/dev/null rmdir ${_docdir} 2>/dev/null
# remove DSSSL catalog entries ${SB_VAR_LIBXML}/bin/xmlcatalog --noout --sgml --no-super-update \ --del ${_docbook_sgml_catalog} ${_dsssl_datadir}/common/catalog ${SB_VAR_LIBXML}/bin/xmlcatalog --noout --sgml --no-super-update \ --del ${_docbook_sgml_catalog} ${_dsssl_datadir}/catalog
# remove SGML Docbook catalog entry ${SB_PATH_SB} -q module-names -i ${SB_PROG_NAME}-${SB_PROG_VER} |\ ${SB_PATH_EGREP} -v ${SB_MODULE_NAME} |\ ${SB_PATH_EGREP} 'docbook-dsssl|docbook-sgml' >/dev/null || { ${SB_VAR_LIBXML}/bin/xmlcatalog --noout --sgml --no-super-update \ --del ${_sgml_catalog} ${_docbook_sgml_catalog} }
:

module.name: sgml-entities
module.uninstall:
_ent_datadir="${_datadir}/entities/${SB_MODULE_NAME}-8879.1986"
# remove super catalog entry ${SB_VAR_LIBXML}/bin/xmlcatalog --noout --sgml --no-super-update \ --del ${_sgml_catalog} ${_ent_datadir}/catalog.sgml
rm -rf ${_ent_datadir}
rmdir ${_datadir}/entities 2>/dev/null rmdir ${_datadir} 2>/dev/null
:

module.name: xml-entities
docbook-xml-4.0
docbook-sgml-3.1
docbook-xml-4.5

item.para: Change installation paths to mirror the more consistent Redhat tree
Forgot to include cals-tbl.dtd for Docbook SGML 4.0
Add module for scrollkeeper 1.1 OMF DTD
Fix rewriteURI and rewriteSystem paths for docbook-xsl module
Forgot to install htmltblx.mod for docbook-sgml-4.3 and docbook-xml-4.3 modules
